product_name: Coghlan's Telescoping Roasting Fork - Special Buy
long_description: Roast the perfect marshmallow or hot dog with the Telescoping Roasting Fork from Coghlan's. The wooden handle has a little wheel you can roll with your thumb to rotate food for even cooking. Chrome-plated forked shaft extends to 34 in. so you can reach perfect coals in the campfire. Special buy.
short_description: Roast the perfect marshmallow or hot dog with the Telescoping Roasting Fork from Coghlan's. The wooden handle has a little wheel you can roll with your thumb to rotate food for even cooking.
